name: Veggies Slayer
description:
Welcome to the world full of dangerous vegetables!

Veggies slayer is a turn based combat game where you can fight veggies and boss vegetables, build your character with different amulets that make you stronger and have fun creating different builds for different enemies.

How to play:

You need to find the enemy and the fight starts. 

Game is divided into 2 phases. First you need to choose your move set and the order of moves.You have four moves: attack, shield, trick and focus. Combat system works like rock, paper, scissors. If you attack a shielded enemy, you can't hurt it, but if you use force, you will break the enemy's defense. If you want to dodge an enemy's attack, use a trick. Your enemy will have the same four moves. When you are ready, you will start to perform your moves one by one. It's very important to have the right order of moves to win as your enemy will try to hurt you.

If you understand your enemy, you will win.

Hint:

Analyze your enemy! Every type of the enemy has a different move set. Vegetables will behave according to the move set. Solve the riddle and the game will be easy.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Click and Interact.
